title: Geforce Now Premium
description: The GeForce NOW app works with Android phones, tablets and TV devices supporting OpenGL ES 3.1 with at least 1.5GB of memory and Android 5.0 (L) or later. Android TV device support is currently in beta and your device may work if it meets the minimum specs above. For an optimal experience, we recommend 5GHz WiFi or Ethernet connection, with at least 15Mbps internet access, and a Bluetooth gamepad
